ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Surefall Glade and the Bears
ygData.msgSnippet: Use EQ zone explorer, not sure if it works for Surefall glade.  But this program is great to learn a zone offline without having to worry about mobs. Mu ...
ygData.messageBody:
Use EQ zone explorer, not sure if it works for Surefall glade. But this
program is great to learn a zone offline without having to worry about mobs.

Mu

-----Original Message-----
From: Denis A. Baldwin [mailto:dbaldwin@...]
Sent: Wednesday, June 27, 2001 10:15 AM
To: everquest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [EverQuest] Surefall Glade and the Bears


Does anyone have a map of the interior of Surefall Glade? Those bears
BUTCHER me every time I go in to retrieve my corpse?

Denis
